result.name: IIS_GENERAL_CPU_USAGE
result.description: Average percentage of processor time occupied

result.name: IIS_GENERAL_CPU_QUEUE_LENGTH
result.description: The processor queue is being filled up with threads when the server's processor are busy servicing other threads at the moment.

result.name: IIS_GENERAL_MEMORY_FREE
result.description: Refers to the amount of physical memory on the system that can be used by new processes.

result.name: IIS_GENERAL_MEMORY_PAGE_PER_SECOND
result.description: Refers to the amount of read and write request from memory to disk.

result.name: IIS_GENERAL_DISK_TIME
result.description: Refers to the percentage of time the disk was occupied.

result.name: IIS_GENERAL_NETWORK_BYTES_PER_SECOND
result.description: Refers to the total amount of bytes over the network.

result.name: IIS_ASPNET_REQUESTS_PER_SECOND
result.description: Shows the throughput o the ASP.NET application on the server.

result.name: IIS_ASPNET_RESTARTS
result.description: Indicates the number of restarts of the application in the server's uptime.

result.name: IIS_ASPNET_REQUEST_WAIT_TIME
result.description: Shows the amount of time that the last request was held in the queue.

result.name: IIS_ASPNET_REQUESTS_QUEUED
result.description: The number of request that are in the queue to be processed.

result.name: IIS_ASPNET_EXECPTIONS_THROWN_PER_SECOND
result.description: number of exceptions per second that the application is throwing.

result.name: IIS_ASPNET_TOTAL_COMMITTED_BYTES
result.description: Amount of virtual memory reserved for the application on the paging file.

result.name: IIS_SERVICE_GET_REQUESTS_PER_SECOND
result.description: Amount of GET requests processed in a second.

result.name: IIS_SERVICE_POST_REQUESTS_PER_SECOND
result.description: Amount of POST requests processed in a second.

result.name: IIS_SERVICE_CURRENT_CONNECTIONS
result.description: Number of active connections with the Web Service.
